attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

idCitation.resAltTitle: QMAP Seamless Geological Units New Zealand
idCitation.otherCitDet: QMAP seamless digital data 2013. Geological Map of New Zealand 1:250 000. Lower Hutt, New Zealand. GNS Science.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This view combines the 3 scale-dependent views of the geological mapping units datasets for both the North Island and South Island of New Zealand. The datasets included are NZL-NI_GNS_250K_geological_units_scale500k, NZL-SI_GNS_250K_geological_units_scale500k, NZL-NI GNS 1:250K geological units (scale 500K-2M), NZL-SI GNS 1:250K geological units (scale 500K-2M), NZL-NI GNS 1:250K geological units (scale 2m-) and NZL-SI GNS 1:250K geological units (scale 2m-). The datsets used are a product of the QMAP Geological Map of New Zealand Project and were produced by GNS Science. They represent the most current mapping of the geology of New Zealand at a scale of 1:250 000. The datasets are stored in an ESRI vector geodatabase and exported to Geoserver.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Spatially represents the geology present at or near the surface at a regional scale.

Where reference to the data is to be included in a Reference List the following citation is suggested: QMAP seamless digital data 2013. Geological Map of New Zealand 1:250 000. Lower Hutt, New Zealand. GNS Science.
(C) Institute of Geological and Nuclear Sciences Limited.

Lower Hutt, New Zealand. GNS Science.

dataLineage.statement: Data compiled on 1:50 000 record sheets, simplified for use at 1:250 000 on to 1:50 000 compilation sheets, and digitised using ArcInfo. Plots of data verified by gis operator and author against compilation sheet. Attributes verified for logical consistency by gis operator. Data combined to form a single database for each individual QMAP sheet. Data passed initial verification checks and published as individual hardcopy maps. Data passed final verification against data dictionary and released in digital form on CD/DVD for individual QMAP sheets. Data combined into single seamless dataset for New Zealand and released as a Web Map Service and a Web Feature Service.
